My daughter and I tried Saigon Kitchen last week. We were really pleased with the food and the service there.   We shared a shrimp roll appetizer that was essentially a shrimp wrapped in an egg roll wrapper. It was delicious. I had the Shrimp Pho' along with the chicken on a stick (can't recall the exact name of the appetizer). It didn't come with a sauce, but was very moist. I normally hate chicken thighs but these were cooked in a way that disguised their taste to me, lol. I also ordered some peanut sauce to go with them.   My daughter had the garlic shrimp and noodles, at the recommendation of our waitress. After tasting her dish, I had plate envy. While my shrimp pho was tasty, it was lacking something- it needed more spices and the broth had a sweet quality to it that seemed odd. On the other hand, the sauce on the garlic shrimp with noodles was terrific - I could eat that all day. I was secretly hoping she couldn't finish her food so I would have a chance at having more.   The prices were a high for a lunch. I also had a to-go order for my husband - Saigon fried rice and an order of the chicken appetizer I had with the peanut sauce on the side - so with all that, the cost of the meal was $78.00, not including tip. BRW, my husband declared his food "delicious."  He spent 4 years in Vietnam and got to know the food very well...  We will definitely go back here. We recently bought a house in Surprise and after it is done being remodeled, will move in a couple of months.
Love you his place. Come every time I'm in surprise. The shaken beef is to die for. Don't miss it!!!!!!

Very good food.  I had the Filet Mignon Shaken Beef and my wife had the Saigon Stir Fry.  I would recommend mine over hers, but both were good.  Good ambiance, but we took our 2-year old...and the staff was very patient and helpful making sure we kept a happy baby at our table.  They do not have it on the menu, but they fixed a chicken and rice meal for her...she loved it.  I highly recommend if you are looking for good Asian food...hit up Saigon Kitchen.

Firecracker shrimp dish was excellent. Pork barbecue banh mi was below average. The texture was that of a pork meat ball that was sliced, and the bread was a little tough for a banh mi. The spiel I was given is that it is "charbroiled pork shoulder." BS. I gave them a couple of chances to tell me the truth, but they kept saying it was BBQ. I'm a foodie so I know this was NOT BBQ pork. They should call it steamed pork product because that it what it tasted like. (The texture was like Spam). Our check also had an extra dish that we didn't order. It was corrected, but still annoying.

Love this place passionately!! Have been coming since it first opened and have never been disappointed with the food and dining experience! Staff is so gracious and lovely ... Food is delicious ... My fave is the beef pho and the garlic wings ... My husband is obsessed with the Vietnamese ribs! So happy to see it expanded this past year with more dining space as it was much needed!  I've brought family & friends in from the UK, California and Florida ... All of whom can't wait to come back and dine here when they return into town! Definitely a top spot in Surprise!
This is definitely my favorite place to eat in Surprise , the food and the service is always top notch.

I can't believe how many years we've lived in Surprise and haven't tried Saigon Kitchen!  We had no experience with Vietnamese food and tried it on a whim. It was nothing like the images we had in our heads. This place is amazing! The food is very flavorful and there is something for everyone. Our 5 year old daughter loves it! If you're thinking about it, come. They are so nice and welcoming. We will be back again and again!

Excellent for the family, a date or dining alone.  Clean,  friendly and delicious.  Great, knowledgeable  staff. Unique asian dishes that are made from fresh ingredients.  Ask your wait what's good,  they'll know the whole menu.  It's awesome!

Great food! The wife and I were pleasantly surprised to find this gem nestled in the heart of fast food and corporate restaurant country out in Surprise.   What we have had: -Pho is good -Wings (Garlic Butter so far) -Shaken Beef is my favorite (med rare) -Garlic noodles were really good  I would highly recommend. Go there!!
Shaken beef and pho! Small dining area but worth the wait and worth the trip. Check it out!

.... Caca.....over rated. Place fells like its falling apart...... Yes, nothing charming about an old building with a loose flooring.... cracking and squeaking....again....Caca......... Oh yah.....the pho ga..... Chicken bouillon cubes.... Thank you.
